add_library(pdfium_lcms2 STATIC
    include/lcms2.h
    include/lcms2_plugin.h
    src/cmsalpha.c
    src/cmscam02.c
    src/cmscgats.c
    src/cmscnvrt.c
    src/cmserr.c
    src/cmsgamma.c
    src/cmsgmt.c
    src/cmshalf.c
    src/cmsintrp.c
    src/cmsio0.c
    src/cmsio1.c
    src/cmslut.c
    src/cmsmd5.c
    src/cmsmtrx.c
    src/cmsnamed.c
    src/cmsopt.c
    src/cmspack.c
    src/cmspcs.c
    src/cmsplugin.c
    src/cmsps2.c
    src/cmssamp.c
    src/cmssm.c
    src/cmstypes.c
    src/cmsvirt.c
    src/cmswtpnt.c
    src/cmsxform.c
)

target_link_libraries(pdfium_lcms2 PUBLIC
    pdfium_headers
)
